title: Everyone has been thinking it
body:
I don't know if anyone else has posted this 'bug' or suggestion but I know many are thinking the same thing.
Everytime we're in the shop and we want to purchase something and then suddenly we get invited to a group OR we accept a game BUT someone declines.
Where we were, all the traces of about to purchase a skin or champion, disappears. It's frustrating because we have to keep going back to the same place in the shop....
If riot fixed this bug, I honestly think there would be an increase in purchase of skins, champs, e.t.c
Anyone else agree?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This has been an issue for quite a long time.

As far as I'm aware, things such as this are [being worked on in the new client, coming soon!](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/client-update.html)
